room_title: Escape room "Trapped in a Horror Movie" by GTFO Escape Room in South Portland
review: We did the trapped in a horror movie room. It was not really scary, but it had lots of puzzles to figure out. They were fantastically accommodating and made it a most excellent experience. Plus there is fudge at the end if you escape. We will go back!

room_title: Escape room "Trapped in a Horror Movie" by GTFO Escape Room in South Portland
review: Lots of challenging fun! The staff are great. We did the horror room. And just made it out with seconds to spare. Will be back.

room_title: Escape room "Trapped in a Horror Movie" by GTFO Escape Room in South Portland
review: We booked for a large group of 14, and they were willing to work with us and stay open outside of business hours. We had a blast in the two rooms we split into, and the puzzles were fun and fair. Try to beat our score on Trapped in a Horror Movie!

room_title: Escape room "Trapped in a Horror Movie" by GTFO Escape Room in South Portland
review: The three of us had a blast here tonight. We have done several escape rooms and Trapped was a new favorite. Can't wait to go back for the next room!

room_title: Escape room "Trapped in a Horror Movie" by GTFO Escape Room in South Portland
review: Had a fantastic time here. The support team was excellent and very accommodating for us. Rooms are well designed with good quality props and relevant clues/challenges to be solved which match the theme of the room. Both rooms are challenging but easy enough to solve in the given time (without hints!) if players work well together. However, I thoroughly enjoyed the unique element of Trapped which provides "limited" lighting and is one of my all time favorites of any room i have visited so far.
